keyword: calories in a 8 oz chicken breast
title: Calories in an 8 oz Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in a 8 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in an 8 oz Chicken Breast
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (grilled or baked), no added oil, sauces, or seasonings; 8 oz ≈ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, brand, added ingredients, and exact weight; always check labels or use a scale for precision.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~374 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and align with Nutrition Facts label formats for quick reference.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g during cooking
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 374 kcal for cooked, skinless boneless.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz chicken breast?
Are carbs low in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g carbs per 8 oz serving under these assumptions.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes—grilling keeps it low; frying or adding oil can add 100+ kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Is 8 oz chicken breast raw or cooked weight?
faqs.a: These values are for cooked weight; raw is higher due to water loss during cooking.
